Title: All Hail the Manslayer! (WIP)
Description: Inspired by the isekai genre, the story follows the reincarnation of the futuristic warrior Manslayer and his new destiny bring about the end of the world. However, it looks like he didn't get a new body, and is stuck on magical life-support. No arms? No Legs? No problem!

Title: Yonderland
Description: First written as a departure from conventional storytelling pedagogy, the story follows three young heroes and their experiences in this peculiar and exciting world. Young adults now and re-united for the first time since childhood, the trio is eager to start their new lives together - though it looks like the upcoming revolutionary war has other plans for them.

Title: Critical Mass: Essetchanine
Description: Caleb's first published work, the story follows five men and one wild week on the island nation of Essetchanine. Between civil strife, mutiny, betrayal, and the supernatural, everyone from every angle is out to get a finger in this tiny nation's future. Between the beggar, the king, the wiseman, the engineer, and the merchant, who will survive to see where this all goes?
